vcsa_monitor.core module¶

vcsa_monitor.core.credentials(vcsa)[source]¶

Get VCSA credentials from SexiGraf repository

Parameters:vcsa (str) – name of a specific vCenter (fqdn)
Returns:username and password decoded in base64
Return type:str
vcsa_monitor.core.logger(path)[source]¶

Create a logger object to file

Parameters:path (str) – log file path
Returns:logger object
Return type:logging
vcsa_monitor.core.options()[source]¶

Define command line arguments and help

Returns:arguments list
Return type:str, bool
